class.name: AudioStreamPlayer3D
class.description: Plays a sound effect with directed sound effects, dampens with distance if needed, generates effect of hearable position in space. By default, audio is heard from the camera position. This can be changed by adding a [Listener3D] node to the scene and enabling it by calling [method Listener3D.make_current] on it.

method.name: get_stream_playback
method.description: Returns the [AudioStreamPlayback] object associated with this [AudioStreamPlayer3D].

method.name: play
method.description: Plays the audio from the given position [code]from_position[/code], in seconds.

method.name: seek
method.description: Sets the position from which audio will be played, in seconds.
